name: single-market-robot-simulator-db-googledrive
description: settings and data db for single-market-robot-simulator studies with storage on Google Drive

scripts.docs: rm -rf ./docs && npx jsdoc -c .jsdoc.conf.json --access all src/index.mjs && mv out docs
scripts.go: npm run lint && npm run docs

author: drpaulbrewer@eaftc.com
